searchDocs.title: Overview​
searchDocs.content: The Token module provides utilities for generating unique tokens in various formats including:  Base256ASCIIBase94JSONSAFEBase64URLHexGUID

searchDocs.title: Basic Usage​
searchDocs.content: local token = Token.new() -- Create a new token generator local guid = Token.guid() -- Generate a GUID local hexToken = token:NextHex(32) -- Generate a 32-character hex token

searchDocs.title: API Reference​
searchDocs.content: For detailed API documentation, see the API Reference.

searchDocs.title: new​
searchDocs.content: </> Token.new( seed: number?-- Optional seed for the randomizer. Must be in range [-9007199254740991, 9007199254740991]. ) → Token-- A new Token generator instance.

searchDocs.title: isbase​
searchDocs.content: </> Token.isbase( token: string,-- The token to validate. tokenBase: TokenBase-- The base format to validate against. ) → boolean-- Whether the token matches the specified base format.

searchDocs.title: guid​
searchDocs.content: </> Token.guid() → string-- A GUID string. Uniqueness is 2^128 possibilities (128-bit).

searchDocs.title: NextBase256ASCII​
searchDocs.content: </> Token.NextBase256ASCII( length: number-- The length of the token. Uniqueness is (256 ^ length) possibilities. ) → string-- A random Base256ASCII string.

searchDocs.title: NextBase94JSONSAFE​
searchDocs.content: </> Token.NextBase94JSONSAFE( length: number-- The length of the token. Uniqueness is (94 ^ length) possibilities. ) → string-- A random Base94JSONSAFE string.

searchDocs.title: NextBase64URL​
searchDocs.content: </> Token.NextBase64URL( length: number-- The length of the token. Uniqueness is (64 ^ length) possibilities. ) → string-- A random Base64URL string.

searchDocs.title: NextHex​
searchDocs.content: </> Token.NextHex( length: number-- The length of the token. Uniqueness is (16 ^ length) possibilities. ) → string-- A random Hex string.

searchDocs.title: Clone​
searchDocs.content: </> Token.Clone() → Token-- A new Token object with the same state as the original.

searchDocs.title: Token​
searchDocs.content: A utility class for generating unique tokens in various formats.

searchDocs.title: Constructor​
searchDocs.content: Token.new(seed: number?): Token   Creates a new Token generator instance.  Parameters:  seed: Optional seed for the randomizer. Must be in range [-9007199254740991, 9007199254740991].

searchDocs.title: Static Methods​
searchDocs.content: guid​  Token.guid(): string   Returns a GUID string. Uniqueness is 2^128 possibilities (128-bit).  isbase​  Token.isbase(token: string, tokenBase: TokenBase): boolean   Validates if a token matches the specified base format.  Parameters:  token: The token to validatetokenBase: The base format to validate against ("Base256ASCII" | "Base94JSONSAFE" | "Base64URL" | "Hex" | "GUID")

searchDocs.title: Instance Methods​
searchDocs.content: NextBase256ASCII​  Token:NextBase256ASCII(length: number): string   Generates a random Base256ASCII string.  Parameters:  length: The length of the token. Uniqueness is (256 ^ length) possibilities.  NextBase94JSONSAFE​  Token:NextBase94JSONSAFE(length: number): string   Generates a random Base94JSONSAFE string.  Parameters:  length: The length of the token. Uniqueness is (94 ^ length) possibilities.  NextBase64URL​  Token:NextBase64URL(length: number): string   Generates a random Base64URL string.  Parameters:  length: The length of the token. Uniqueness is (64 ^ length) possibilities.  NextHex​  Token:NextHex(length: number): string   Generates a random Hex string.  Parameters:  length: The length of the token. Uniqueness is (16 ^ length) possibilities.  Clone​  Token:Clone(): Token   Creates a new Token object with the same state as the original.
